p: The sensory quality of the chicken burger samples cooked in the oven at 180°C and 45 min by means of a five‐point hedonic method was investigated by a trained panel of 10 laboratory staff members. Trained panel were asked to judge the odor (5, extremely desirable; 1, extremely unacceptable/off‐odors); and taste (5, extremely desirable; 1, extremely unacceptable) of the samples. The samples were defined as unacceptable when the sensory attributes declined below 4.0 (Ojagh, Rezaei, Razavi, & Hosseini, 2010).
